snippet.title: Valiant Tactics - Official Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Valiant Tactics is a tactical turn-based roguelite RPG without hit chance RNG. Assemble a team of fearless heroes, engage in fast-paced battles against diverse foes, amass powerful equipment and progress through levels to confront and overthrow the usurper in an epic showdown!

Wishlist Valiant Tactics now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2412280/Valiant_Tactics/

Follow us:
Discord: https://discord.gg/Bzg8uN3wb6
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Valiant_Tactics
